name: Gem Dash!
description:
Dash up and Dash down.
Your mission is to collect Gems, to score as high as you can.
Look out for red gems, they give you bonus points but make you invisible.
While avoiding deadly trees and obstacles, you will be zipping up and down.
Use your Gems to Unlock new Characters.
Simple one tap play.
Collect gems to score.
Compete on the leaderboard.
Will you be number one.
